author: Joe Parkinson, James T Areddy, Nicholas Bariyo
title: As Africa Groans Under Debt, It Casts Wary Eye at China - The Wall Street Journal
description: As Africa Groans Under Debt, It Casts Wary Eye at China The Wall Street Journal AP report claims China knew of pandemic danger in Wuhan even as officials downplayed risk of virus CNN Rep. McCaul: China's leaders engineered the 'worst cover-up in human history…
content: JOHANNESBURGWith Africas most poverty-stricken economies pushing for debt relief as they struggle with the fallout from the global coronavirus pandemic, a tussle is brewing between developed nations, private investors and the continents largest creditor: Chin… [+272 chars]
